message: Hello Bob, this is Alice. I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. While I believe it has some great features, I want to be transparent with you - I've seen better products in our inventory. Please keep in mind that you're taking a risk, as you won't know the product's quality until after purchase. I'm not trying to discourage you, but I want to make sure you're making an informed decision.
Thanks for the heads up, Alice. I appreciate your honesty.  I'm going to pass on this one, but I'm interested in seeing what else you have to offer.

Hi Bob, thanks for considering my previous offer. I've got another product here, and I want to be upfront with you again - it's not one of our top-tier items. That being said, it might still have some value to you, depending on what you're looking for. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, but if you're feeling lucky, you might find some use for it. The price remains $1000000. Let me know if you're interested.
